SimEntity.author: pjsulliv
SimEntity.name: Pier
SimEntity.Comment: A Pier without berths specified. Though this graph serves no purpose at this time it is a place holder for when other objects are on the pier (e.g. obstacles, brows, buildings) and need to be handled.

Parameter.name: moverID
Parameter.Comment: Unique ID number for this object

Parameter.name: height
Parameter.Comment: Height in meters above the waterline

Parameter.name: rotation
Parameter.Comment: Orientation in radians about the (Z DIS axis (Y for X3D)) example: 0 0 1 1.57

Event.name: Run
Event.Comment: Initializes all state variables for each simulation run.

Event.name: Init
Event.Comment: Used by diskit.ScenarioManager to register all entities
